sentences.english: This week is for mourning. Tears have a therapeutic power.
sentences.chinese: 这是哀痛的一周，泪水可以治疗悲伤。

sentences.english: Whenever sad time, god of destiny will be a silver pen on paper drawing a circle.
sentences.chinese: 每当悲伤一次，命运之神便会用银笔在纸上画一个圈。
悲伤使她变得迟钝麻木了。

sentences.english: Alina was tired, and cold, and sad.
When it is cloudy, i am cold, impuissant and sad.
sentences.chinese: 只要天气阴暗，我就会非常的冷漠，无奈，甚至悲伤。

sentences.english: Weep no more , no sigh , nor groan . Sorrow calls no time that's gone .
sentences.chinese: 栵别哭泣，别叹息，别呻吟，悲伤唤不回流逝的时光。

sentences.english: Hearing this, Wilbur threw himself down in an agony of pain and sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 听到这话，威尔伯瘫坐下来，极度痛苦和悲伤。

sentences.english: Saddening. I hope he is able to live and one day find some happiness.
sentences.chinese: 悲伤，我希望他能活下来，有一天能找到一些幸福。

sentences.english: The disturbance of self-regard is absent in mourning; but otherwise the features are the same.
sentences.chinese: 在悲伤中不会陷于自重，但其他特点是相同的。

sentences.english: She went nearly mad with grief after the child died.
sentences.chinese: 孩子死后，她悲伤的几至疯狂。

sentences.english: There’s nothing sadder than a social network account with few or no friends.
sentences.chinese: 没有比在一个社交网站中没有朋友更悲伤的事情了。

sentences.english: They were distressful memories to her.
sentences.chinese: 它们都是使她感到悲伤的回忆。

sentences.english: With shame and grief he dared no longer look towards that heaven where his father lived.
sentences.chinese: 愧疚悲伤令他不敢望向父亲安息的天堂。

sentences.english: He hanged himself in sorrow after his wife died.
sentences.chinese: 妻子死后，他因悲伤而自缢。

sentences.english: Maybe I am too able to hide myself.
sentences.chinese: 也许，我太会隐藏自己的悲伤。

sentences.english: I lost my money in an evil hour.

definition: to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to lose (sth)/to drop (sth)/to feel a sense of loss/frustrated/disappointment/loss
